channel.title: Jamtime on Gustav Jansson
channel.description: Recent content in Jamtime on Gustav Jansson

item.title: I'm not dead
item.description:
Whoa‚Ä¶ almost 5 months since last time! I gotta post more than twice a year üôÇ

Anyways, I‚Äôve been quite busy since last time:

  • My pwn game library is still in development.
  • and I‚Äôve entered ludum dare twice..

I‚Äôve posted my first entry, let‚Äôs go cave exploring, earlier in this blog. My second entry for the ‚ÄúExplore‚Äù theme was ‚ÄúXplorer ‚Äì the game‚Äù a kinda unfinished 2-player game that ends when everything is explored

item.title: I've been busy
item.description:
Since last time I‚Äôve entered Ludum Dare and actually finished at 75ths place and a bronze in community ‚Äì yay me.

Since then I‚Äôve integrated the half/16-bit float from the glorious OpenEXR-project into my game-library pwn.

I‚Äôve also been thinking about creating a 2d level editor as editing text-files suck, and there doesn‚Äôt seem to be a good level-editor. Most of the 2d level editors are focused on tile-based editing, but I want a more free-flow sprite-based editor, like the aquaria editor(nicely captured by wolfire design tour) or the boingo editor that is briefly visible in their sga trailer. Preferably I like the editor to be integrate-able with box2d (so that it generates the collision geometry).

item.title: Epic fail
item.description: I probably should have posted this earlier, however I been sleeping and sobbing over the fact that I didn‚Äôt finish no more sweden :). A few hours before deadline all tiles in one layer went 3 tiles up, but collision-tiles were still in the same place. I though that was strange so I went to check the map in the (external) editor, and to my horror it didn‚Äôt load. No message, no crash nor any exception ‚Äì just silence.

item.title: No more sweden - It can't be true
item.description: So I‚Äôm attending this game-jam called No more sweden(funny name) this week. Wednesday/Thursday to Saturday/Sunday. I‚Äôll be attending most of it, though I have to work at Thursday and Friday, which is a bummer, so Ive been thinking at what kind of game I‚Äôm be making. I‚Äôve been thinking about making a simple plat former for some time now, and this might be good time as any to make it a reality.
